name: UnionQualityTypesAndQualityTypes
title: Union of Quality Types And Quality Types

property.description: Indicates that the concept is deprecated and should not be used
Indicates that the concept is deprecated and should not be used

concept.definition: Situation Quality. For this quality type, the quality code should be a code taken from the http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/vs/situation-quality value set.
Device Measuring Quality. For this quality type, the quality code should be a code taken from the http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/vs/device-measuring-quality value set.
Usage Quality. For this quality type, the quality code should be a code taken from the http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/vs/usage-quality value set.
